backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, visa records, and per-user application status management with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence for removing the disclaimer block from the Australian Visa Status Check page and lists affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing routing, components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining the application's color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication state, hash routing, and conditional rendering of landing, dashboard, profile setup, or visa check pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing a header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright info and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, branding, login/logout controls, and optional user profile display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Component for adding, removing, and listing preset or custom reminder dates tied to visa expiry.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Upcomi: Displays upcoming and overdue reminders by flattening visa records and sorting reminder timestamps, showing badges and dates.
frontend/src/components/status/Applicati: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of application statuses with form dialogs and table display using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordF: Form dialog for creating or editing visa records, including expiry handling and reminder management.
frontend/src/components/visa/VisaRecordL: Lists visa records with edit/delete actions and expiry status indicators, loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating and refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages simple hash-based routing between 'home' and 'visa-check' states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, visa records, reminders, and application statuses using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by rendering App within QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AustralianVisaCheckPa: Implements a form page for checking Australian visa application status using a mutation hook and displays results or errors.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabs for visa records and application status management, including forms and reminders.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with hero content, feature cards, and login or visaâ€‘check navigation actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters to support routing and persistent state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color system using OKLCH vars, extended typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing features, architectural notes, compliance considerations, and current state for the VisaTrack app.
